field.name: summary
field.value: Patch ViewComponents to build from Castle's trunk@HEAD

field.name: description
field.value: Attached patch: * adds a reference to Castle.MonoRail.Pagination to the ViewComponents contrib project (2005 and 2008) * Attempts to update the usage of IPaginatedPage in GridComponent to be in line with changes in trunk@HEAD * adds a couple of missing PDB/XML-doc files

comment.author: petemounce
comment.text:
I don't know whether I should attach the built DLLs here; the patch is predicated on the contents of SharedLibs also containing Castle DLLs that are built from trunk (my build is at 5326).
I would appreciate someone reviewing my edit to GridComponent!
